About the Company: Bhagwati Autocast Ltd is engaged in producing high duty grey iron and ductile iron castings as per International Standards. The company also produces SG iron castings and alloy iron castings.They are manufacturing high quality castings for a wide spectrum of industries such as, Automotive, Light and Heavy Commercial Vehicle, Tractor, Air & Gas Compressor, Hydraulic ,Wind Generation/Generator, Refrigeration, Plastic Injection Moulding Machine and General Engineering Products.
